entities.name: dumbledore's army
entities.description: Dumbledore's Army is mentioned as a group that might be involved in reading Harry's mail. The text implies that Umbridge could use the excuse to manage Harry's mail.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as someone who could use the excuse to read Harry's mail and confiscate it. She is also implied to be aware of how close a call last night was.

relationships.description: Umbridge could use the excuse to read Harry's mail and confiscate it, implying that Dumbledore's Army might be involved in this activity.
